==Trivia==
* The achievement name in each language{{Verify}}<!-- already verified: EN, ZHS, ZHT, JA, ES --> is a reference to Hu Tao's [[Hu Tao/Lore#Character Story 5|Hilitune]] in the corresponding localization. Dusky Ming sings it in ''[[Wangshu]]'', and [[Hu Tao]] sings a fuller version in her voice-over [[Hu Tao/Voice-Overs#More About Hu Tao: I|"More About Hu Tao: I"]].<!-- also in her idle, but that's ECJK only and it's shorter anyway -->
